title: Meta-Context Transformers for Domain-Specific Response Generation
venue: Pacific-Asia Conference on Knowledge Discovery and Data Mining

tldr.text: DSRNet (Domain Specific Response Network), a transformer-based model for dialogue response generation by reinforcing domain-specific attributes is presented, which shows significant improvement over the state-of-the-art for multi-turn dialogue systems supported by better BLEU and semantic similarity (BertScore) scores.
